#Question 1

```{r,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
uscities = readr::read_csv("D:/LifeInUCSB/Study/GEOG176A/week2/assignment5/geog-176A-labs/data/uscities.csv") %>% 
  filter(city ==("Palo"))
sf_uscities = st_as_sf(uscities, coords = c("lng", "lat"), crs = 4326) %>%
  st_transform(5070) %>% 
  st_buffer(5000) %>% 
  st_bbox() %>% 
  st_as_sfc() %>% 
  st_as_sf()

```
